channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.description: Meeting 4-8 Notes: Task items: Actions completed: 1. Caught up with one another on the show 2. Listed topics up to Tuesday. - Discussed which were relevant (All but IP) 3. Divvy’d Tasks for Tuesday Divvy’d Tasks: 1. Dylan: - Format the notes into a plot timeline - Create a list of tech in the movie: - Categorize: Old, current, exiting, fictional, in research, similar, dates (not mutually exclusive…) - Talk if its portrayal was realistic - Use the class tech timeline, fill in gaps.
